title: Snowday Malzahar Poro Bug
body: When Snowday Malzahar goes B the poro is artifacting blue. Everyone can see it so it is not a missing or damaged file.

replies.body:
Hey Seth21212 -

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix.
If Graves can't have his cigar at least let malz have his poro <3
